sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time/> <cooking_instructions>For Puris: 1. Mix semolina, all-purpose flour, baking powder, and salt in a bowl. 2. Gradually add water to form a stiff dough. 3. Cover and rest for 30 minutes. 4. Roll out small balls of dough into thin discs. 5. Deep fry in hot oil until puffed and golden brown. 6. Drain on paper towels. For Filling: 1. Mix mashed potatoes and boiled chickpeas. 2. Add chaat masala, red chili powder, and cumin powder. Mix well. To Serve: 1. Make a small hole in the center of each puri. 2. Fill with the potato and chickpea mixture. 3. Drizzle with tamarind chutney and mint coriander chutney. 4. Serve immediately.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Indian">8f495a179791021069a3b6fce053afcf</cuisine> <diet>bca1c6979711021069a3b6fce053af90</diet> <effort/> <image/> <ingredients>Semolina (1 cup), All-Purpose Flour (1/2</ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Appetizer">91508fd39755021069a3b6fce053af8b</meal_type> <name>Pani Puri</name> <nutrition>Calories: 200, Protein: 5g, Fat: 10g, Carbs: 20g</nutrition> <owned_by/> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Boil and mash potatoes. 2. Boil chickpeas.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time/> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b891d71f9795021069a3b6fce053afde</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
